# organizationName

**Instance Property**

The name of the organization associated with the contact.

## Declaration

```swift
var organizationName: String { get }
```

## Getting Work Information

- **jobTitle**: The contact’s job title.
- **departmentName**: The name of the department associated with the contact.
- **phoneticOrganizationName**: The phonetic name of the organization associated with the contact.
